message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below the value of this product.  I could consider letting it go for $11,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I still feel that $8,000 would be a fair price for the product. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
